Mod.Name: Vehicle Camera Options v1.01
Mod.Author: Camo
Mod.Description: Full control of vehicle cameras (Standard vehicles, walkers and tanks)

Tweak_Table_Entry.Description: Separate FOV value for vehilces (not walkers or tanks)

Tweak_Table_Entry.Name: Vehicle_camera_recenter_rate
Tweak_Table_Entry.Description: Multiplier for how fast the camera will recenter behind the vehicle

Tweak_Table_Entry.Name: Vehicle_predictive_adjust
Tweak_Table_Entry.Description: Same as Vehicle camera recenter rate except only for predictive cameras.
